item.title: Marketing Dashboard on Google Spreadsheets
item.description: How I created an automated/self-updating marketing dashboard on Google Spreadsheets Intro I recently wanted to pull data from Google Spreadsheets, do some manipulation using Python, and push the cleaned data back onto Google Spreadsheets. And so I was researching on ways to connect read and write gspreadsheets with Python. Upon Googling I realized that there are a few ways to do it, and yet many of them seems to be outdated.
